siteMetadata.title: jpinedev Portfolio
siteMetadata.description: Jacob Pine's Game Development portfolio website built with GatsbyJS.
siteMetadata.author: Jacob Pine
siteMetadata.bio: As a game programmer, I love the puzzle of designing scalable systems, networking for multiplayer games, and creating tools to assist with content creation. I would most like to gain experience developing multiplayer games and tools to expedite game creation.
